name: Competitive Farming
description:
Land is scarce. Be the fastest farmer!

Controls:
Hold mouse click on left side of the screen to turn left
Hold mouse click on right side of the screen to turn right
Hold mouse click in middle of the screen to brake

There are three Phases:
Phase1: Ploughing. Conquer as much territory as possible
Phase2: Planting. Set as Many seedlings as possible. Seeds that are on your ground will be upgraded.
Phase3: Harvest. Get as many plants as possible. Upgraded plants are worth more points!

Will you be the very best?
